title: 怎么让苦力怕的爆炸无破坏，末影人也是还有怎么让火烧不掉东西啊~~~~
author: 123jianmus
txt_content: 怎么让苦力怕的爆炸无破坏，末影人也是还有怎么让火烧不掉东西啊

replies.author: woshouyin
replies.txt_content: 开聊天栏输入/gamerule mobGriefing true

replies.author: 红石奇葩大神
replies.txt_content:
woshouyin 发表于 2013-4-19 19:11 
开聊天栏输入/gamerule mobGriefing true
是false吧

replies.author: woshouyin
红石奇葩大神
replies.txt_content:
woshouyin 发表于 2013-4-25 19:15 
是吗
true是开启，false是关闭 怪物破坏方块

replies.author: cctv10
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕和基佬输/gamerule mobGriefing false  ,  火输/gamerule doFireTick .
